meanings.definition: A Japanese fashion trend characterized by schoolgirl uniforms and high platform shoes.
meanings.sent1: The kogal trend includes schoolgirl uniforms and tall shoes.
meanings.sent2: She loves the kogal style with its schoolgirl outfits and high heels.
meanings.sent3: In her kogal outfit, she looked ready for a school fashion show.
meanings.sent4: Her kogal look was like a colorful school uniform come to life.
meanings.sent5: The kogal fashion trend stands out with its unique schoolgirl-inspired outfits.

meanings.definition: A young Japanese woman who follows the kogal fashion trend.
meanings.sent1: She is a kogal who embraces the latest fashion trends.
meanings.sent2: The kogal enjoys dressing in trendy schoolgirl-inspired outfits.
meanings.sent3: The kogal giggled as she tried on her new schoolgirl outfit.
meanings.sent4: Her friend is a kogal, always stylish and up-to-date with fashion.
meanings.sent5: The kogal's confidence shines through her trendy clothing choices.

meanings.definition: To dress in the style of a kogal.
meanings.sent1: She decided to kogal up for the costume party.
meanings.sent2: He loves to kogal and stand out with his unique outfits.
meanings.sent3: They kogal together for the fun of dressing up.
meanings.sent4: Kogaling for the event, she felt like a fashion icon.
meanings.sent5: The group planned to kogal for the themed party and have a blast.
